Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: People are talking about the latest news and buzzing topics in Australia. Calls for a huge boost in JobSeeker payments are growing while there is a strong indication that the base rate of payments will increase soon. A massive rescue operation off the coast of Western Australia saved 11 fishermen who were stranded for several days without food and water. The Reserve Bank of New Zealand is currently at the center of a debate over whether it has done too much to boost the country's economy. Meanwhile the Australian share market has closed lower following a close call on this month's interest rate decision from the Reserve Bank.
